Description:
Detects an uncommon child process of "odbcconf.exe" binary which normally shouldn't have any child processes.

Author: Harjot Singh @cyb3rjy0t
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Uncommon Child Process Spawned By Odbcconf.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where parent_process_path like '%\odbcconf.exe'
